mapper.select: SELECT dpi.id,dpi.sid,dpi.code,dpi.fullName,dpi.simpleName,dpi.type,dpi.status, dpi.amount,dpi.rate,dpi.repayType,dpi.deadline,dpi.establish,dpi.actLoanTime as payDate, dpi.expireDate,dpi.addDate,dpi.addUser,dpi.updDate,dpi.updUser,dcl.payLoanNo, dpir.shouldPrincipal + dpir.shouldInterest AS payAmount FROM dr_claims_loan dcl LEFT JOIN dr_subject_info dsi ON dsi.lid = dcl.id LEFT JOIN dr_product_info dpi ON dpi.sid = dsi.id LEFT JOIN dr_product_invest_repayinfo dpir ON dpir.pid = dpi.id WHERE dcl.claimsOriginate = 2 AND dpi.status = 8 AND dpi.type NOT IN (1,5) AND dpi.isSyn = 0 AND dpi.actLoanTime IS NOT NULL
mapper.update: update dr_product_info set isSyn = 1 WHERE id = #{id:INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT id , code , status FROM dr_product_info WHERE isSyn = 1 AND status = 9 AND type NOT IN (1,5)
